attributes.action: step down and allow carol mcgiffin to become prime minister !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: let carol mcgiffin become prime minister . if you watch her on tv you will see and hear her no nosense approach to how our country should be run . maggie brought the country to it's knees , tony fed the pockets of the private sector and gordon is taking us into a recession , although he won't admit it yet . CAROL MCGIFFIN FOR FIRST PREMIER !

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
